name: CrayonQuest
description:
A 2D platformer that was made for the Centennial College Fall 2021 Game Jam. Switch between the real and imaginary world to get through the level collecting all the items, once you do you win the game!

Enjoy! n.n We would love to hear any feedback and bugs you find from playing!

Team Members:
  • Alan Nunes Borges - Level Designer
  • Anthony De Fazio - Lead UI/UX Designer
  • Arthur Senna - Programmer
  • Christopher MacDonald-Clark - Lead Audio Engineer
  • Robert Day - Lead Programmer
  • Merik Salvadore-Ally - Lead Artist, Lead Animator, Level Designer
